ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe vs. Mino Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a good bit of information, and I for one appreciate the thought that went into it.  What does the polished granite tomahawk usually cost, and would
ygData.messageBody:
This is a good bit of information, and I for one appreciate the thought that went
into it. What does the polished granite tomahawk usually cost, and would some of
you enterprising paladins on Tunare be willing to team up and work at getting one
for each member of the team? Same question for the magical shield - anybody want
to team up & tackle 'em together?

Kaladin

RangerDest@... wrote:

> From: RangerDest@...
>
> I like the Dwarven Axe better, since I am able to attack much faster than the
> mino axe. unfortunately I can only hit for a max of 13. In the end it adds
> up to more damage than the mino thanks to the lower delay.
>
> Look at it this way, DA is 26 delay, MA is 37.
>
> After 8 seconds the DA can hit 3 times (26+26+26 = 72 / 10 = 7.2 seconds) and
> do a max of 39 dmg (13 max per hit)
>
> After 8 seconds the MA can hit twice (37+37 = 74 / 10 = 7.4 seconds) and do a
> max of 34 dmg (17 max per hit)
>
> But it really depends on personal choice. I really want that tomahawk axe,
> same stats as the dwarven axe but it also casts that Berserker strength spell.
>
> -Adaron
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
